title: Any item cannot be selected for the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, any item cannot be selected for the first time. After the first attempt, the item can be selected as expected.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view for the first time.

Observed behavior: Any item cannot be selected for the first time.

Expected behavior: The second time I select the item, it should be selected as expected.
OB: Any item cannot be selected for the first time in library outline view
EB: The second time I select the item, it can be selected as expected.

2. Try to select any item in the view for the first time.
